import "../bookticket.css"; import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import Image1 from "../images/movies_screen/screen.png"; import gsap from "gsap"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Bookticket(e) { const navigate = useNavigate(); let tl = gsap.timeline({ ease: "power1.in" }); let clicked = false; function buttonanimation(e2) { if (clicked === false && count !== 0) { tl.to("#button", { width: "50px", duration: 0.5 }); tl.to("#w", { y: "0%", duration: 0.5 }); clicked = true; setTimeout(() => { navigate("/"); }, 3000); } } const [count, setCount] = useState(0); const [Price, setPrice] = useState(0); function changecolor(e) { if (e.target.className !== "row") { if (e.target.style.background !== "green") { e.target.style.background = "green"; setCount(count + 1); setPrice(Price + 150); } else { e.target.style.background = " #01163E"; setCount(count - 1); setPrice(Price - 150); } } } return ( {/*
*/}
